name: APPLIED_CAMERA_LUT
desc: 3D LUT Returns the name of the 3D LUT that is currently applied If no LUT is applied or if the current 3D LUT is disabled an empty string is returned

name: AUDIO_EXTERNAL_LINK_GAIN
desc: External Audio Link Ch 3 Ch 4 Gain

name: AUDIO_HEADPHONE_SOURCE
desc: target Headphone Source Headphone source selection

name: AUDIO_INTERNAL_LINK_GAIN
desc: Internal Microphone Link Left Right Gain

name: AUDIO_SOURCE
desc: target Audio Source Audio input source selection

name: AUTO_WHITE_BALANCE
desc: Auto White Balance Perform auto white balance

name: CALIBRATION_STATUS_INTEGRATION_TIME
desc: Calibration Status Integration Time The status of the current calibration based on integraion time

name: CALIBRATION_STATUS_TEMPERATURE
desc: Calibration Status Temperature The status of the current calibration based on sensor temperature

name: CAMERA_CDL_EXPORT_ALL_TO_MEDIA
desc: Camera CDL Export All to Media

name: CAMERA_LUT_EXPORT_ALL_TO_MEDIA
desc: Camera LUT Export All to Media

name: CAMERA_PRESET_EXPORT_ALL_TO_MEDIA
desc: Camera Preset Export All to Media

name: CAMERA_RUNTIME
desc: Camera Runtime Total camera runtime in seconds

name: COLOR_TEMPERATURE_PRESET
desc: Color Temperature Preset Color temperature preset to apply Incandescent Daylight etc

name: CURRENT_CALIBRATION_INTEGRATION_TIME
desc: Current Calibration Integration Time The current calibration s integration time

name: CURRENT_CALIBRATION_TEMPERATURE
desc: Current Calibration Temperature The current calibration s sensor temperature

name: FOCUS_DIST_DISPLAY_MODE
desc: Focus Distance Display Mode Focus distance display mode or metric

name: HAND_CONTROLLER_IRIS_POS
desc: status Iris Position Iris Position 0 Aperture 65535 Aperture

name: LENS_FOCAL_LENGTH
desc: Lens Focal Length The focal length of the lens in mm

name: LENS_FOCUS_DISTANCE
desc: Lens Focus Distance The near and far focus distances as a string in feet inches 11'11 " - 17'11"

name: LENS_IS_STATUS
desc: Lens Image Stabilization Current image stabilization status

name: LIVESTREAM_ENABLE
desc: Live Stream Enable Enable or disable Livestream Livestream video is made available via the multi art HTTP protocol serving JPEG frames on port 9090 Livestream audio is streamed in 16bit PCM 48KHz format on port 9292

name: LIVESTREAM_QUALITY
desc: Live Stream Quality Factor JPEG compression quality of Livestream

name: LIVESTREAM_RECT_PIXELS
desc: Livestream Sensor Mapping Sensor Coordinates that map to current livestream view

name: MEDIA_APPROVED_STATUS
desc: Status indicating whether or not inserted media has been approved by RED

name: MEDIA_CAPACITY
desc: Media Capacity Media capacity reported by the card for example 128 GB

name: MEDIA_CDL_IMPORT_ALL_TO_CAMERA
desc: Media CDL Import All to Camera

name: MEDIA_LUT_IMPORT_ALL_TO_CAMERA
desc: Media LUT Import All to Camera

name: MEDIA_PRESET_IMPORT_ALL_TO_CAMERA
desc: Media Preset Import All to Camera

name: MEDIA_STATUS
desc: Media Status State of removable media card

name: POWER_IN_ACTIVE
desc: Active Power Source Specifies which power in is currently active

name: POWER_IN_CURRENT
desc: Status Power In Current Current of each power in in milliamps (mA) where the index is the power source and the value is the amperage 0 DC IN 1 Bat 1 2 Bat 2

name: POWER_IN_LOW_POWER
desc: Status Power In Low Power Only power source is running low

name: POWER_IN_PERCENT
desc: Status Power In Percentage Remaining Percentage remaining of each power in where the index is the power source and the value is the percentage from 0 to 100 not applicable for DC N 0 DC IN 1 Bat 1 2 Bat 2

name: POWER_IN_PRESENT
desc: Status Power Source Present Indicates which power sources are present where the index is the power source and the value or 1 is whether or not it is present 0 DC IN 1 Bat 1 2 Bat 2

name: POWER_IN_RUNTIME
desc: Status Power In Time Remaining Time remaining of each power in where the index is the power source and the value is the minutes remaining not applicable for DC N 0 DC IN 1 Bat 1 2 Bat 2

name: POWER_IN_VALID
desc: Status Power In Valid Indicates which power sources are valid where the index is the power source and the value or 1 is whether or not it is valid 0 DC IN 1 Bat 1 2 Bat 2

name: POWER_IN_VOLTAGE
desc: Status Power In Voltage Voltage of each power in in millivolts (mV) where the index is the power source and the value is the voltage 0 DC IN 1 Bat 1 2 Bat 2

name: POWER_OUT_ENABLE
desc: Power Out Controls if power out on EXT port is enabled or not

name: PRESETTABLE_ITEMS
desc: Presettable Items List of presettable RCP Parameters Note : RCP_PARAM_ prefix has been omitted for each item

name: PRE_RECORD_DURATION
desc: target Pre ecord Duration User settable pre ecord duration in milliseconds

name: PRE_RECORD_ENABLE
desc: Pre ecord Enable Enable Pre ecording

name: PRE_RECORD_FRAMES
desc: Pre ecord Frames to Record Number of frames to pre ecord

name: RECORD_FORMAT_SUPER_35_ANA
desc: stored in camera Super 35 Anamorphic (6K) A filtered view of RCP_PARAM_RECORD_FORMAT

name: RECORD_FORMAT_SUPER_35_SPHERICAL
desc: stored in camera Super 35 (6K) A filtered view of RCP_PARAM_RECORD_FORMAT

name: SENSOR_CALIBRATION
desc: stored in camera Sensor Calibration Applied sensor calibration

name: TEMPERATURE_PCM
desc: Power Board Temperature Temperature of the power board in Celsius (C)

name: UART_EXT_BAUD
desc: EXT UART Baud Rate Baud Rate of UART on EXT port

name: UART_EXT_PPP_IP_ADDRESS
desc: EXT UART PPP IP Address IP Address of UART on EXT port if using PPP

name: UART_EXT_PROTOCOL
desc: EXT UART Protocol Protocol for UART on EXT port

name: USBC_DHCP
desc: USB DHCP Enable Enable or disable DHCP for KOMODO LINK USB

name: USBC_GATEWAY
desc: target USB Gateway Gateway for KOMODO LINK USB assigned by DHCP or desired static gateway if DHCP is disabled

name: USBC_IP_ADDRESS
desc: target USB IP Address IP address for KOMODO LINK USB assigned by DHCP or desired static address if DHCP is disabled

name: USBC_NETMASK
desc: target USB Netmask Netmask for KOMODO LINK USB assigned by DHCP or desired static netmask if DHCP is disabled

name: WIFI_ADHOC_BAND
desc: Wi Ad oc Frequency Band Wi Ad oc Frequency Band

name: WIFI_ADHOC_CHANNEL
desc: Wi Ad oc Channel Wi Ad oc Channel

name: WIFI_ADHOC_ENCRYPTION
desc: Wi Ad oc Encryption Wi Ad oc Encryption type

name: WIFI_ADHOC_PASSWORD
desc: Wi Ad oc WPA2 Passphrase Wi Ad oc WPA2 Passphrase

name: WIFI_ADHOC_SSID
desc: Wi Ad oc SSID Wi Ad oc SSID

name: WIFI_DHCP
desc: Wi DHCP Enable Enable or disable DHCP in infrastructure mode

name: WIFI_GATEWAY
desc: target Wi Gateway Assigned gateway if DHCP is enabled if not then desired static gateway

name: WIFI_INFRASTRUCTURE_CONNECT
desc: Wi Infrastructure Connect Initiate connection to specified SSID

name: WIFI_INFRASTRUCTURE_FORGET
desc: Wi Infrastructure Forget Forget a previously saved network

name: WIFI_INFRASTRUCTURE_MANUAL_SSID
desc: Wi Infrastructure Other Networks Initiate a manual SSID entry notification Message value is ignored

name: WIFI_INFRASTRUCTURE_SCAN
desc: Wi Infrastructure Scan Initiate scan for available Wi SSIDs

name: WIFI_INFRASTRUCTURE_SIGNAL
desc: Wi Infrastructure Signal Strength Wi Received Signal Strength in dBm Any number from WIFI_SIGNAL_INVALID to 0 is valid The other values in wifi_signal_t define thresholds

name: WIFI_INFRASTRUCTURE_SSID
desc: Wi Infrastructure SSID Wi Infrastructure SSID

name: WIFI_IP_ADDRESS
desc: target Wi IP Address Assigned IP address if DHCP is enabled if not then desired static IP address

name: WIFI_MAC_ADDRESS
desc: Wi MAC Address Wi MAC address

name: WIFI_NETMASK
desc: target Wi Netmask Assigned netmask if DHCP is enabled if not then desired static netmask

name: WIFI_INFRASTRUCTURE_NETWORKS
desc: Wi-Fi Infrastructure Networks,Wi-Fi Infrastructure Saved and Available Networks
